pli-tv-pvr1.1:98.6_0: Aññataro bhikkhu eḷakalomāni paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaṁ atikkāmesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:98.9_0: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:98.10_0: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:99.1_0: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā eḷakalomāni dhovāpentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:99.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū aññātikāhi bhikkhunīhi eḷakalomāni dhovāpesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:100.1_0: Rūpiyaṁ paṭiggaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:100.6_0: Āyasmā upanando sakyaputto rūpiyaṁ paṭiggahesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:101.1_0: Nānappakārakaṁ rūpiyasaṁvohāraṁ samāpajjantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:101.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū nānappakārakaṁ rūpiyasaṁvohāraṁ samāpajjiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:102.1_0: Nānappakārakaṁ kayavikkayaṁ samāpajjantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:102.6_0: Āyasmā upanando sakyaputto paribbājakena saddhiṁ kayavikkayaṁ samāpajji, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:104.1_0: Atirekapattaṁ dasāhaṁ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:104.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atirekapattaṁ dhāresuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:104.9_0: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:104.10_0: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:105.1_0: Ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṁ navaṁ pattaṁ cetāpentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:105.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū appamattakenapi bhinnena appamattakenapi khaṇḍena vilikhitamattenapi bahū patte viññāpesuṁ,
pli-tv-pvr1.1:106.1_0: Bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṁ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:106.6_0: Sambahulā bhikkhū bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṁ atikkāmesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:106.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:107.1_0: Atirekamāse sese gimhāne vassikasāṭikacīvaraṁ pariyesantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:107.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atirekamāse sese gimhāne vassikasāṭikacīvaraṁ pariyesiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:108.1_0: Bhikkhussa sāmaṁ cīvaraṁ datvā kupitena anattamanena acchindantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:108.6_0: Āyasmā upanando sakyaputto bhikkhussa sāmaṁ cīvaraṁ datvā kupito anattamano acchindi,
pli-tv-pvr1.1:109.1_0: Sāmaṁ suttaṁ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:109.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sāmaṁ suttaṁ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:110.1_0: Pubbe appavāritassa aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṁ āpajjantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:110.6_0: Āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṁ āpajji,
pli-tv-pvr1.1:111.1_0: Accekacīvaraṁ paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṁ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:111.6_0: Sambahulā bhikkhū accekacīvaraṁ paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṁ atikkāmesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:111.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:112.1_0: Tiṇṇaṁ cīvarānaṁ aññataraṁ cīvaraṁ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṁ vippavasantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:112.6_0: Sambahulā bhikkhū tiṇṇaṁ cīvarānaṁ aññataraṁ cīvaraṁ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṁ vippavasiṁsu,
pli-tv-pvr1.1:112.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:113.1_0: Jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:113.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:119.1_0: Yaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:119.6_0: Āyasmā hatthako sakyaputto titthiyehi saddhiṁ sallapanto avajānitvā paṭijāni,
pli-tv-pvr1.1:119.9_0: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:119.10_0: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:119.11_0: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:120.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pesalehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ bhaṇḍantā pesale bhikkhū omasiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:121.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṁ bhaṇḍanajātānaṁ kalahajātānaṁ vivādāpannānaṁ pesuññaṁ upasaṁhariṁsu,
pli-tv-pvr1.1:122.1_0: Anupasampannaṁ padaso dhammaṁ vācentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:122.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū upāsake padaso dhammaṁ vācesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:122.9_0: siyā vācato samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:122.10_0: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:123.1_0: Anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:123.6_0: Sambahulā bhikkhū anupasampannena sahaseyyaṁ kappesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:123.9_0: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:123.10_0: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:124.1_0: Mātugāmena sahaseyyaṁ kappentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:124.6_0: Āyasmā anuruddho mātugāmena sahaseyyaṁ kappesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:124.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:125.1_0: Mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṁ desentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:125.6_0: Āyasmā udāyī mātugāmassa dhammaṁ desesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:125.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti padasodhamme …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:126.1_0: Anupasampannassa uttarimanussadhammaṁ bhūtaṁ ārocentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:126.6_0: Vaggumudātīriyā bhikkhū gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsiṁsu,
pli-tv-pvr1.1:126.9_0: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:126.10_0: siyā vācato samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:126.11_0: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:127.1_0: Bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṁ āpattiṁ anupasampannassa ārocentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:127.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhussa duṭṭhullāpattiṁ anupasampannassa ārocesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:128.6_0: Āḷavakā bhikkhū pathaviṁ khaṇiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:130.6_0: Āḷavakā bhikkhū rukkhaṁ chindiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:131.6_0: Āyasmā channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicari, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:132.6_0: Mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ bhikkhū ujjhāpesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:133.1_0: Saṅghikaṁ mañcaṁ vā pīṭhaṁ vā bhisiṁ vā kocchaṁ vā ajjhokāse santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:133.6_0: Sambahulā bhikkhū saṅghikaṁ senāsanaṁ ajjhokāse santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamiṁsu,
pli-tv-pvr1.1:133.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:134.1_0: Saṅghike vihāre seyyaṁ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:134.6_0: Sattarasavaggiyā bhikkhū saṅghike vihāre seyyaṁ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamiṁsu,
pli-tv-pvr1.1:134.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:135.1_0: Saṅghike vihāre jānaṁ pubbupagataṁ bhikkhuṁ anupakhajja seyyaṁ kappentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:135.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū there bhikkhū anupakhajja seyyaṁ kappesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:135.9_0: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:136.1_0: Bhikkhuṁ kupitena anattamanena saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:136.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā bhikkhū saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:137.1_0: Saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṁ mañcaṁ vā pīṭhaṁ vā abhinisīdantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:137.6_0: Aññataro bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṁ mañcaṁ sahasā abhinisīdi,
pli-tv-pvr1.1:137.9_0: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:137.10_0: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:138.1_0: Dvattipariyāye adhiṭṭhahitvā tatuttari adhiṭṭhahantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:138.6_0: Āyasmā channo katapariyositaṁ vihāraṁ punappunaṁ chādāpesi,
pli-tv-pvr1.1:139.1_0: Jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ tiṇaṁ vā mattikaṁ vā siñcantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:139.6_0: Āḷavakā bhikkhū jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ tiṇampi mattikampi siñciṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:141.1_0: Asammatena bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:141.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū asammatā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:141.11_0: siyā vācato samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:141.12_0: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:142.1_0: Atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:142.6_0: Āyasmā cūḷapanthako atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:142.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti padasodhamme …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:143.1_0: Bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:143.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:143.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:144.1_0: “Āmisahetu bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantī”ti bhaṇantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:144.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū “āmisahetu bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantī”ti bhaṇiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:145.1_0: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ dentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:145.6_0: Aññataro bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ adāsi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:146.1_0: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ sibbentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:146.6_0: Āyasmā udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ sibbesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:147.1_0: Bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:147.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:147.9_0: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:147.10_0: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:147.11_0: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:147.12_0: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:148.1_0: Bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:148.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:149.1_0: Jānaṁ bhikkhuniparipācitaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:149.6_0: Devadatto jānaṁ bhikkhuniparipācitaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñji, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:149.9_0: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:150.1_0: Bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:150.6_0: Āyasmā udāyī bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:150.9_0: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:152.1_0: Tatuttari āvasathapiṇḍaṁ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:152.6_0: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṁ bhuñjiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:152.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:153.6_0: Devadatto sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñji, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:153.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:154.6_0: Sambahulā bhikkhū aññatra nimantitā aññatra bhuñjiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:154.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:155.1_0: Dvattipattapūre pūve paṭiggahetvā tatuttari paṭiggaṇhantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:155.6_0: Sambahulā bhikkhū na mattaṁ jānitvā paṭiggahesuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:156.1_0: Bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṁ khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:156.6_0: Sambahulā bhikkhū bhuttāvī pavāritā aññatra bhuñjiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:156.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:157.1_0: Bhikkhuṁ bhuttāviṁ pavāritaṁ anatirittena khādanīyena vā bhojanīyena vā abhihaṭṭhuṁ pavārentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:157.6_0: Aññataro bhikkhu bhikkhuṁ bhuttāviṁ pavāritaṁ anatirittena bhojanīyena abhihaṭṭhuṁ pavāresi,
pli-tv-pvr1.1:158.1_0: Vikāle khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?

pli-tv-pvr1.1:158.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:159.1_0: Sannidhikārakaṁ khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:159.6_0: Āyasmā belaṭṭhasīso sannidhikārakaṁ bhojanaṁ bhuñji, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:159.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe….

pli-tv-pvr1.1:161.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe….

pli-tv-pvr1.1:163.8_0: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe….

pli-tv-pvr1.1:232.1_0: Yaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaragharaṁ paviṭṭhāya
